CustomField.inlineHelpText: The lower limit of the duration of the estimated period during which the activity is repeated regularly. Use this field and the Period Length Upper Limit field if you know only the estimated length of the activity period, but not the specific length or the specific dates. For instance, if you're asked to do cardio for 10 minutes 5 times every 2 days for 3-4 weeks, this field would have the value 3.
